Song.title: You Stand Alone
Song.copyright: Â© 2015 Sovereign Grace Praise/Sovereign Grace Worship Music & Words by Neil DeGraide, George Romanacce, & Dale Bischof

Arrangement.text:
INTRO: [C | G | Am7 | Em D | C | G | Am7 | Em D | C | C ]
VERSE 1: [G] You spoke and time began [C/G] Light dawned at Your command And [G]by Your Word the [D/G]Earth began to [C/G] move [| C/G] [G] Carved mountains with Your hands, [C/G] breathed life into all men You [G]made it all and [D/G]saw that it was[C/G] good
PRE-CH 1: [Am] There is no [Em]rival [D] to You, O God [Am] All kings and [Em]idols will [D]one day fall
CHORUS: [C]Who among the [G]gods is like Y[Em]ou? [| D] [C]Who could ever [G]measure{,} all You've [Em]done, O G[D]od? Cre[C]ator, Sust[G]ainer, [Em]merciful [D]Savior, for[C]ever on You[D]r throne You stand a[C]lone,[| G | Am7 | Em7] [ ]Yo[D]u sta[| C]nd alo[| G | Am7 | Em D]ne
VERSE 2: [G] Your Spirit gave the Law, [C/G] in kindness to us all And [Em]though we never k[D]ept it,{,} You were [C]true [G] Lawmaker, You have saved{,} [C/G] lawbreakers from the grave And [Em]by Your Son{,} our [D]guilt has been re[C]moved
PRE-CH 2: [Am] Your endless [Em]glory [D] shines through Your Son [Am] There is no [Em]story of [D]greater love
BRIDGE: [||:] [C] There is no one [G]like our G[Am]od{,} (Yo[|]u [Em]stand [D]alone[:||]) [(4x) ]
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 you spoke and time began light dawned at your command and by your word the earth began to move carved mountains with your hands breathed life into all men you made it all and saw that it was good prech 1 there is no rival to you o god all kings and idols will one day fall chorus who among the gods is like you who could ever measure all youve done o god creator sustainer merciful savior forever on your throne you stand alone you stand alone verse 2 your spirit gave the law in kindness to us all and though we never kept it you were true lawmaker you have saved lawbreakers from the grave and by your son our guilt has been removed prech 2 your endless glory shines through your son there is no story of greater love bridge there is no one like our god you stand alone
